Package org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.oauth

Everything related to signing users in and out of Mapillary.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MapillaryLoginListener
    This interface should be implemented by components that want to get notified when the user logs in or logs out of his Mapillary account.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapillaryUser
    Represents the current logged in user and stores its data.
    OAuthPortListener
    Listens to the OAuth port (8763) in order to get the access token and sends back a simple reply.
    OAuthUtils
    A set of utilities related to OAuth.
    UploadUtils
    Upload utilities.

Package org.openstreetmap.josm.plugins.mapillary.oauth Description

Everything related to signing users in and out of Mapillary. We are using OAuth 2.0 to authenticate the user against the Mapillary API. See https://a.mapillary.com/#oauth for more details.
